titleInfo.title: Country Music Show at Woody's Val-E-Vue Campgrounds

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing Woody's Val - E - Vue Campgrounds Country Music Show schedule featuring the Dolly Parton Show on May 18, the Tom T. Hall Show on June 15, the Hank Williams Jr. Show on July 13, the Truckers Special on August 10, and Mel Tillis Show on September 7. Poster was printed for job no. 16207. For additional information about this order see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/24692.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
